<a id="VisualShaderNodeTextureParameterTriplanar"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeTextureParameterTriplanar

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeTextureParameter](VisualShaderNodeTextureParameter.md) **\<** [VisualShaderNodeParameter](VisualShaderNodeParameter.md) **\<** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Performs a uniform texture lookup with triplanar within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Performs a lookup operation on the texture provided as a uniform for the shader, with support for triplanar mapping.
